name: Deep Sky (Alecksandar Jackowicz)
description:
Deep Sky is a 3D space shoot-em-up where the Space Neptunians are attempting to steal water from Earth. Only you, the last pilot left can stop the invasion and protect the Earth. 

Recommended to play in full screen.

Credits:

Programming-

Kevin Caton-Largent
Alecksandar Jackowicz
Handi Xu

Art:
Wencheng Yang
Terrence Gipson
Gwendolyn Snapp
Fabio Ribak

Thank you for playing our game!
